writer.name: 迈尔斯·康诺利 Myles Connolly

director.name: 迈尔斯·康诺利 Myles Connolly

this_title: The Arctic: Our Last Great Wilderness
introduction: Imagine a place that is vast, wild and untouched, where some of the world's greatest wildlife spectacles unfold. The Arctic National Wildlife refuge, situated in the northeastern corner of Alaska, is the wildest place left in North America. A symbol of wilderness for the world. No one has truly ever seen it. "The Arctic: Our Last Great Wilderness" will feature the first-ever cinematic account of this little known land where people can experience a world untouched by time.
foreign_title: The Arctic: Our Last Great Wilderness
